* Iron Raptor could feel the impact of each charge as it hit the shield, the 
images on it glowing brighter with the energy collected by each hit.
At the current moment she had enough energy to create an energy orb again, 
bu8t for some reason her mind kept her thinking that she could create more 
then that.
Something big!
Iron Raptor glanced towards Nemisis Enforced from behind the visor of the 
shield.
She watched as he reached in to subspace and took out a charge set, thinking 
that what she had in mind for him...even those wouldn't help him.
But he had a pretty good field of weapons, she had to admit that.
Iron Raptor's eyes widened as she saw him drop them.*

" Shit!"

* Barely having time to brace herself she felt the shield buck violently in 
her hands as the charges hit, sending an explosion which crept around the 
edges of the shield and began to melt the armor on her arms and legs.
She clenched her teeth and winced as the explosion died away to leave her 
armor to harden against her skin.
She was going to have a touch time peeling those plates off! Probably take a 
bit of her skin/armor with it!
The shield bucked again, nearly snapping off her arm as a few of the charges 
Nemisis sent hit the alloy.
The markings on her shield nearly glew at a blinding rate by now, the 
charges which almost mented IR completely being more then enough power for 
what her mind had in store.

Iron Raptor looked at Nemisis Enforced throught eh visor for a second more 
before removing the shield, it retracking into her arm and leaving a long 
glowing line along the top of it in the armor. An energy bar.
She looked at Nemisis.*

" Kind of ironic, isn't it?"

* taking the sword out from behind her, the blade glowing with blinding 
light as she drew it over her shoulder.*

" The energy you sent to destroy me..."

* She then brought the sword down so that the tip of it pointed up towards 
Nemisis, bring her other hand up to grip the handle along with the other.
The blade seemed to explode for a moment, a wind picking up around it's 
holder from the sheer force of the energy.
Iron Raptor braced herself.*

"...will destroy YOU!!!"

* The blade seemed to explode again as a thick beam of light errupted from 
the base of the blade and worked it's way up towards the tip.
Iron Raptors targeting system melding with the energy to give it a direction 
to go to hit her targrts.
The beam left the blade and went for what it was instructed to, Nemisis.
Tuned to the pattern of his sparkbeat, the thick beam of energy shot towards 
him, so larget that it would engulf him as soon as it struck!
But as the straight energy headed for Nemisis a few tentrels of it branched 
off of it, arching around and heading for a few more targeted beings while 
the main stem kept on it's current course.
The tendrels snaked around, one heading rowards Dark Wolf. Silent and 
quicker then light itself!
Another shot towards Perndabot just as quickly.
With as much power as was in the energy, the shere force of it entering any 
body would short out any curcuit they may have. As well as, perhaps, create 
an internal explosion which could wipe out the spark completely.*
